1.title: The Grand Paladin Order
1.plot: In the winter tundras of Kaddoral, home of the Grand Paladin Order, a swarm of ageless thralls have begun sieging the city. The paladins prepare to defend it, while the biggest question on everyone's mind is who will lead the Order next?

2.title: The Senate of Deadlantis
2.plot: The underwater city of Deadlantis is home to the largest population of Ageless beings in the entire realm. The different ageless factions and their representatives known as senators, have gathered once again to discuss politics after a rumor started going around that the Grand Paladin has been slain. This campaign takes place both before and after the Birth of Magic and is centered around the father of the Tarciel'Embeart elven family. This is the tragedy of Daedric Tarciel'Embeart.

3.title: Azveltara Z
3.plot: After a heated discussion with King Rohbear Leomaris, the master assassin known as Lyn Azveltara has decided to go against her king's wishes and send her personal assassins on a dangerous mission to maintain world order.

4.title: The Purge
4.plot: The Grand Paladin Order has declared open season on the hunting of all Ageless throughout the realm. Zealous Paladins have heard the Grand Paladin's decree as a call to arms and are now sweeping through villages slaying all Ageless beings.

5.title: Lyn Azveltara Gaiden
5.plot: Before Lyn Azveltara would train some of the world's deadliest assassins, she had to become a master assassin herself. To do so, Lyn tries to climb to the top of The Tower of Ultimate Wizardry, to be trained by Dragon Aspect Quintara Lotus.

6.title: The Sandbolds
6.plot: The Sandbolds were uplifted beings born before the Birth of Magic by Sun Dragon God Phanto himself to serve as his eyes. Their innate truesight and connection to the Old Gods allows them to bend any physical laws of the universe and allows them to be immune to effects of time magic. They are the watchers of the realm who know when and where time magic will occur. They monitor and record the actions of these events and report them to the Sun Dragon. But with their dragon creator dead in the sky and their purpose now in doubt, one of the Sandbolds has found a new truth ...

7.title: Galen Sunsword: Private Investigator
7.plot: Galen Sunsword has arrived at Than'drellfal, the capital city of Elves, to bring the news of his father's death to the high council of Elves known as the Mana Arc. But instead of meeting the entire council, Galen has decided he would rather first spend some time with the council's most powerful member. At the request of Dragon Aspect Quintara Lotus, Galen has been asked to look into the suspicious death of Marrel Limboratti, an Elven Enchantress who worked for Quintara and who was killed with a most unusual spell.

8.title: The Last Beenu
8.plot: Bei Mei Xhir't and Lyn Azveltara's relationship has soured, and their cursed Beenu child Norokoh has begun to reach the age of maturity. Against Lyn's wishes, Bei Mei has begun to train Norokoh into a master assassin just like her mothers.

9.title: A Night to Remember
9.plot: The war of the Ageless is about to devour much of the Realm in conflict, but this isn't the first time time that Ageless have threatened the living. Hawkthorn Draughwin, Feather of the Realm, is currently meeting with the rest of the Mana Arc about whether or not they should join forces with the Dwarves and go to war with the Ageless. Hawkthorn's youngest daughter Perdita, however, is much more casual about the idea that her world may be about to fall apart as she is hosting a party for one of her friends.

10.title: The Lightbeards
10.plot: Thor has abandoned the dwarves. The Ageless threat grows each day as more dwarves are killed by mindless thralls and demonic spiders. We now follow the life of Bruce Willakers, the first Grand Paladin and the king of all dwarves.

0.title: The Nuren Campaign
0.plot: The pilot campaign of URealms Live. The goal was ultimately to fight a Dragon, but due to the pace at which the party moved, the goal became instead to defeat Bopen the Skeleton Lord.

1.title: Band of Thieves
1.plot: Yumi's band of thieves are tasked by Nisovin to steal the Sun Key from the Spellblade Elves. The team starts off with just three members: Yumi herself, Squinks the Keen Gnome Bard, and Gracias the Okagnoma Gnome Sorcerer. Yumi also hires a Dwarf Warrior named Bumbley.

2.title: Porc Hunters
2.plot: Captain Ca-Rell is warned about a group of Porcs in a cave who are going to attack the town of Danevur, so Ca-Rell and the Theta Squad go to kill the Porcs.

3.title: The Jewel of the Dingo Isles
3.plot: Captain Merci of the Bocoe is told by Nisovin to follow a map to find a precious treasure and bring it to him. If it is found to be valuable to Nisovin, he may reward the crew generously.

4.title: The Many Gobos of Pat
4.plot: A group of five goblins were adopted as children by Pattenborrow Threecircle, the Elf Paladin. Pryor, the father of Madelyne, also lives with the group. On the anniversary of their adoption, which they treat as their birthday, their home is raided by four Dwarf Paladins, led by Willis, who are looking for Pat.

5.title: The Sunswords
5.plot: Gwyneth Sunsword heads a caravan of three captive Kobolds and a Porc traveling towards their prison at the Silvermine Mountains. She is accompanied by her current boyfriend Kallark, her two ex-boyfriends Xavius and Bob, and fan fiction writer Dave.

6.title: The Unseen Rogues
6.plot: At night, the group of four teenage Dwarves breaks through the wall of a museum they have been scoping out for weeks. They have been tasked by their "grandmother" Mona to steal a vase from the museum.

7.title: Kobold Headhunters
7.plot: A team of Kobolds defend their town from a Wolf that has been terrorizing the town of Karazzim.

8.title: The Zarlin Catacombs
8.plot: A group of Gnome treasure hunters, along with a tourist, explore an ancient ruin of the Beenu civilization, called The Zarlin Catacombs.

9.title: The New Crew
9.plot: Captain Merci has been given a new mission from Nisovin that requires more crew. It is to obtain the orange key from the Sunswords on their vacation island. Rick Snot is Nisovin's apprentice and automatically a part of the crew to Merci's dismay.

10.title: The Silvermine Mountains
10.plot: Rusty, Margaret O'Malley, Khn'n-Rell, and Trusty Neconni are each sentenced to life within the Silvermine Mountains and are escorted by Gwyneth and the Sunswords.

11.title: Sidequest: Guild of Explorers
11.plot: The crew has been assigned a quest from the Guild of Explorers to find the Secret Scrolls of the Sandbold, and set out into the desert in an attempt to find them.

12.title: Sidequest: Battle of the Bards
12.plot: The crew play as participants in a competition of performers called the Battle of the Bards.

13.title: Sidequest: The Blood Snake Queen
13.plot: A group of mercenaries are hired to find and kill the mysterious Blood Snake Queen.

14.title: Sidequest: The Death of Virgo
14.plot: Virgo Sunsword and his party are sent to a village to investigate some missing Elven soldiers.

1.title: Woodcarvers
1.plot: The small town of Waldon has been having some troubles with a fungus infection in the forest. The townsfolk are afraid that if the fungi get a hold of the forest, it could put them out of work, or worse, put their town in danger. A band of Lumberjacks known as The Woodcarvers are planning to head deep into the forest to deal with the outbreak before it puts the town at risk.

2.title: Okagnoma Guild Hall
2.plot: The Okagnoma Guild Hall is a Mage College where many Gnomes come to learn the ways of Wizardry and Magic. With some of the most eccentric and powerful Gnome Professors in all of the realms, students who attend this college often leave either as a powerful mage or dead as they are also the college with the highest accidental mortality rates.

3.title: Murder Bros
3.plot: The campaign centers around a legendary group of Kobold outlaws known as The Murder Bros, who are attempting to hijack a carriage train which is passing through the Dwarven town of Silverflats.

4.title: The Cobblers
4.plot: The campaign features Borris Cobbler and his family. Borris Cobbler is a simple man with a complicated responsibility and even more complicated family. He has come to Chossals, a small Dwarven town that has been having problems with some Goblins over the last few months.

5.title: The Tower of Ultimate Wizardry: Chapter One
5.plot: The Tower of Ultimate Wizardry is a magical spire constructed by some of the most powerful mages in the realm. Home to Dragon Aspect Quintara Lotus who lives in its penthouse, no one is really sure how tall the tower is as its outward appearance does not reveal its true scale. A group of four elven casters have come together to attempt to scale the tower.

6.title: Unexpected Discovery
6.plot: The Guild of Explorers has found an ancient dungeon from before the Birth of Magic and is currently working on terms to sell the discovery to the Grand Paladin Order. While these two organizations have worked with each other in the past, their goals are very different from each other. The Guild seeks out to maximize its profits while the Grand Paladin Order searches for artifacts and ancient texts that are important to their order.

7.title: Buckeroos
7.plot: The Law has arrived to the Silverflats after the gang known as The Murder Bros recently attacked the town, derailed a train, and killed the local Sheriff. Their investigation will lead them right to the hideout of the these wanted criminals where a showdown is destined to take place.

8.title: The Fall of Dundinborough
8.plot: The Kingdom of Dundinborough was 1 of the 12 Dwarven Clans built by the Divine Aspect Thor after the Birth of Magic. Ruled by its King and Queen, it was one of the few strongholds that waited far too long to sign the Ironstone Accords and was ultimately destroyed by Ageless Raiders. This is the story of four guards during the final moments of Dundinborough.

9.title: Den of Devils
9.plot: A Den of Devils is a large cavern deep underground made by Dragon Aspect Vlaurunga that is used as a breeding ground for the creation of whelplings and dragons. The powerful wizard Nisovin has hired the Guild of Explorers to venture deep into a recently discovered den to acquire some Dragon Eggs.

10.title: The Skeleton King
10.plot: Bopen the Skeleton King is a childhood story that most believe to still just be merely a story. No one seriously takes the idea of an all powerful Ageless pirate king plundering the high seas as fact, up until the moment they hear his cackle with their own ears. Born from the rubble of Dundinborough, Bopen is shrouded in mystery but the real power of this self proclaimed Skeleton King will soon start to unravel.

imdb.title: URealms Live
plot: _URealms Live_ (qv) is a role-playing game series in which every episode is an entire campaign with new characters in a shared world, rather than the long-running campaigns and characters of most RPGs.
